body.name: Eicaus Portable and Flexible Phone Tripod Stand for Cellphones, Compact Mini Tripod with Remote for Video Recording, Vlogging and Travel Photography(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 49 mins
features: Material Upgrade: The tripod legs are crafted from premium-grade metal with all-metal connectors, fortified with a protective layer of rubber coating and foam. Enhanced with non-slip rubber feet, this design ensures maximum stability on both tabletops and floors.

Lightweight and Compact: With its super flexible legs, this tripod offers effortless angle adjustments, enabling you to wrap it around railings or other objects for even more shooting possibilities. Plus, it easily straightens for compact storage and portability, making it perfect for travel, hiking, camping, and even as a selfie stick.

Multi-Angle Shooting: The phone clamp and tripod head have been upgraded to rotate 360 degrees, providing the convenience of vertical, horizontal, and high-angle modes for your phone without the need to remove it. Moreover, the 360° rotatable ball joint allows for smooth angle adjustments of your phone or camera.

Functional Accessories: The package features an enhanced phone clamp, accommodating phones up to 5.7 inches wide, coupled with a cold shoe mount for microphone and LED light. It also comes with a wireless Bluetooth remote control, functional up to 30 feet, and compatible with most phones. The standard 1/4 thread allows use with most digital cameras, and we also offer a BC adapter that works with GoPro.

What You Get: This product includes a mobile phone tripod, wireless remote control, phone clamp, GoPro adapter, and user manual. Our dedicated customer service team is available to assist you with any inquiries you may have. Note: If accessory missing, please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy compact stand
reviews.reviewText: We took this when we traveled for ease in packing but function for Zoom meeting while we were away. It’s great. The perfect stand for my IPhone and the remote control works well for pictures .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life changing sturdiness!
reviews.reviewText: This transformed how we filmed some social media content! Sturdy, easy to use, and small enough to carry in a backpack. Super pumped with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good little tripod
reviews.reviewText: it’s pretty good for the price. it came very fast too. it works well as a grip when closed, and am able to mount it on unusual areas. only thing is that the ball head could be a little tighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lil gadget
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for taking pictures/ it bends around everything from tree branches to bike handlebars and the foam liner grips it in place. The remote that comes with it is a cool, slick bonus and works great. Plus if I'm watching a YouTube video or listening to music 🎵 it holds it where I can easily see and hear it. For the price it's a no brainer. I'm 💯% totally satisfied with my purchase and recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very flexible and yet sturdy I haven't tried to put a camera on it just my phone..it feels like a camera would make it fall cause of the weight...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this after seeing a friend always pulling out her adjustable and portable tri pod whenever we had an outting for a group picture. This isn’t quite the same but had similarities. I wanted one to use for our family Thanksgiving and worked perfectly well. I liked how easy and flexible it was and so compact. The remote worked well enough to capture my entire family. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and handy
reviews.reviewText: Purchase this on a whim to take family photos, the little remote is Bluetooth and super easy to use with my iPhone. Easy to set up easy to attach your phone easy right out of the box. Grace price point, would buy again and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Could be improved
reviews.reviewText: The article although it fulfills the function of holding the phone, it has no stability when placing the phone and no matter how much adjustments so that it is a little inclined, it still falls. I had to bend the legs because being the way it came and opening the legs also lost stability and the phone was moving forward. On the other hand, he had a small problem perhaps from the factory, which is as if he wanted to break on the back of the product but so far it has not broken. I'm writing this review after I've used it for about two weeks. I repeat, I could get better. If you are looking for something better, in fact you will have to invest a little more. And I almost forgot the stand where the phone goes usually stays open, that is, it does not return to its normal position (maybe the internal springs were not good)
